snippet: Valentin Balakhnichev, a former head of the Russian track and field federation, rejected allegations that his organization worked with top officials from the International Association of Athletics Federations to try to blackmail athletes before the...
abstract: Former Russian track and field federation leader Valentin Balakhnichev and International Association of Athletics Federations president Sebastian Coe deny allegations that either of their organizations tried to blackmail athletes guilty of doping before 2012 Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Valentin Balakhnichev, a former head of the Russian track and field federation, rejected allegations that his organization worked with top officials from the International Association of Athletics Federations to try to blackmail athletes before the 2012 Olympics.
